title: The Fish run
creator_credit: Merlin Films, Jack Flack and Jack Howells
brief_description: The daily 300-mile run of heavy transport lorries carrying fish from Aberdeen to Manchester, filmed against an interesting scenic background. On the occasion recorded in the film, the run takes on an added interest as the lorries are testing a new fuel injector pump en route.
creator_credit_for_label: Merlin Films, Jack Flack and Jack Howells

On the occasion recorded in the film, the run takes on an added interest as the lorries are testing a new fuel injector pump en route.
